short_summary: Maintenance of Buoys for Lower North Shore, North Shore and Gaspésie
description: The Contracting Authority, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of maintenance services for buoys and their accessories for the Lower North Shore, North Shore and Gaspésie regions as detailed in Annex A.

full_summary:
Attentive Bid Requirements
DM290105
Gaspésie Buoy Maintenance Service
During our initial review, the following information was made available regarding this procurement opportunity:
Reference:
Notice Date | Quick Response System ID | Solicitation ID
------------|-------------------------|------------------------
2023-05-18    | 15343428                  | WS3788599531
Procurement ID:
Title (English) | Title (French)
----------|---------- ----------
Gaspésie Buoy Maintenance Service | Service d'entretien des bouées de la Gaspésie
Location: | Gros-Morne, Champlain and Gaspésie regions, Quebec

Division Areas:

* Marine craft systems and subassemblies
* Location and navigation systems and components
* Paints and primers and finishes
* Navigational equipment and instruments
* Industrial painting service
* Welding and brazing and soldering services

Key Contractual Deliverables

* Provide buoy maintenance services, including painting and repairs
* Ensure all services align with local user needs
* Meet standards for coastal buoys operations and management
* Maintain compliance with regulations
* Outline enhanced Indigenous Participation Plan in bid response

Minimum Required Documents

Prior to closing, submitters must register with the following sources:

* Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Bankruptcy and Insurance Searches in Canada
* Contractor Tracking System (CTS)

Place of Payment
* Payment will be made to the submitter name as per the contract

Eligibility Criteria

* Issued by the contracting authority: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* Respondent status applicant: Alleliance Supporting Company stripper

Awarding Criteria
Evaluation criteria:
-           Indigenous participation
-           Pareto Front and Technical Merit
* Score based on bid submission
* TPI acceptance prior
### Expand List

Direct question and Expansion of this Extra Birds

*   An Arranged coherent lead should precede the list entries. In our edited Entry we address some of the components independently and speak to their compelling considerations explicitly.
*   Removing redundant or redundant programming statements saw a publishing image
